00045 // Compare ourself to obj
00046 // If obj is not a RooRealVar call parent Compare()
00047 Int_t BdkRooRealVar::Compare(const TObject* obj) const
00048 {
00049   if (const RooRealVar* r = dynamic_cast<const RooRealVar*>(obj)) {
00050     if (getVal() > r->getVal()) return 1;
00051     else if (getVal() < r->getVal()) return -1;
00052     else return 0;
00053   }
00054   else return RooAbsArg::Compare(obj);
00055 }
